articles.title: England Reducing 14-Day Quarantine With Testing - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: England is giving international travelers an alternative to a 14-day quarantine -- you can now quarantine for five days and then be tested.
articles.content: Back in May, the UK introduced a mandatory 14-day quarantine for all travelers arriving from “high-risk” areas. Up until now there hasn’t been any option to skip this quarantine with testing, though … [+4085 chars]

articles.author: Adedayo Akala
articles.title: With Many Stores Closed, Salvation Army's Bell-Ringing Campaign Suffers - NPR
articles.description: With traffic down at stores and malls across the nation during the pandemic, the charity's iconic red-kettle campaign might bring in half the donations compared with last year.
articles.content:
The Salvation Army's red-kettle campaign is expecting fewer donations and volunteers this year as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
Charles Rex Arbogast/AP
